title: Identify the Unknown
text: We are looking for the total distance traveled and we can name it "d"
speech: We are looking for the total distance traveled and we can name it "d"
pacedSpeech: We are looking for the total distance traveled and we can name it "d"

title: Translate
text: We can use the formula $$distance=rate time$$ --> $$d=rt$$
speech: We can use the formula  distance is equal to, ratetime  -->  d, is equal to r t
pacedSpeech: We can use the formula   distance is equal to, ratetime
-->   d, is equal to r t

title: Substitute
text: Since we are given that the rate is $$60$$ mph and the time is $$5.5$$ hours, we can substitute $$r=60$$, $$t=5.5$$ and get $$d=60\times5.5$$.
speech: Since we are given that the rate is  60  mph and the time is  5.5  hours, we can substitute  r is equal to 60 ,  t, is equal to 5.5  and get  d, is equal to, 60 times 5.5 .
pacedSpeech: Since we are given that the rate is   60
hours, we can substitute   r is equal to 60
and get   d, is equal to, 60 times 5.5

title: Solve
text: Solve $$60\times5.5$$ to find the distance in miles. What is the distance?
speech: Solve  60 times 5.5,  to find the distance in miles. What is the distance?
pacedSpeech: to find the distance in miles. What is the distance?
